-14-
Janiiary 110 - Film director and floor manager for commercial TV station
desires switch to ETV. Also has been chief cameraman and continuity
writer. Male, 30, -single. Location open. $55/wk. "*
January ill - Experienced film technician, many years of office ex¬
perience in several fields including motion pictures, managerial and
supervisory capacities. Male, 40, married. Desires location in
Southern California. $100/wk.
January 112 - Male, 45, married, with 20 successful years in commercial
radio-TV, now employed as program director, wants to switch to an
ETV station near a college or university where he can finish his academic
degree. Prefers locate in East or Midwest. $6500.
January 1T3 - Male, 48, single, Ph.D., desires positidn as program
director or continuity writer with ETV. - Has had advanced degrees in
radio-TV, some practical experience. Location open. $5000.
January 114 - Creative writer for network TV wants switch to ETV.
Has written freelance for “Cavalcade of America/' “Theatre of the
Mind" and many documentaries. Male, 48, married, B.A. Prefers
- locate on* either coast. $10,000.
•January 115 - Assistant producer-director for 3 years in major ETV
UHF station desires advancement. Has theater, radio background.
Woman, 27, B.A. (working on M.A.) single. Prefers West or Midwest
location. $3 50/month.
January 116 - Director of women's programs for radio and TV wants
switch to ETV. Has also been copywriter, talent, and producer.
Woman, 37, separated. Prefers locate in New England.; $100/wk.
January 117 *- Male, 31, single, B.F.A., stage director, co-writer
and producer of special events shows; has been art director at leading
ETV station, wants producer-director position in ETV with opportunity
to double as art director. $6500.
January 118 - Male, 25, B.S., married, with much past experience
as radio announcer, desires position in educational radio. Prefers
Midwest location, $4000.
January 119 - Woman commentator^ 51, producer, actress, writer,
with considerable standing in commercial radio-TV, wants educational
broadcasting position . Will forfeit financially to do so. Location
open* $7000. ’ ‘
